allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>nul & timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul & cd /d ""c:\dev\EaseMail - The Future"" && if exist .next rmdir /s /q .next && if exist node_modules\.cache rmdir /s /q node_modules\.cache && if exist .swc rmdir /s /q .swc && if exist tsconfig.tsbuildinfo del /q tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && echo Cache cleared successfully")

Bash(cmd.exe /c "timeout /t 3 /nobreak >nul && cd /d ""c:\dev\EaseMail - The Future"" && (if exist .next rmdir /s /q .next) && (if exist node_modules\.cache rmdir /s /q node_modules\.cache) && (if exist .swc rmdir /s /q .swc) && (if exist tsconfig.tsbuildinfo del /q tsconfig.tsbuildinfo) && echo All caches cleared successfully")
